translations: vi.放荡；诱使做不道德的事

phrs.translation: 使堕落, 使失落, 堕落, 使误入歧途

sentences.sentence: Love is debauch thing, people are frustrated can not play.
sentences.translation: 爱情是风花雪月的事，失意的人是玩不起的。

sentences.sentence: Why on earth should we take this market sentiment any more seriously than that which led to the great debauch of 2007?
sentences.translation: 导致2007年“大堕落”的市场情绪不该被认真对待，既然如此，为什么我们就该认真对待目前的市场情绪呢？

sentences.sentence: After a long time of debauch, I became to realise I should not live in that way any longer if I didn't want to ruin my self completely.
sentences.translation: 在很长时间堕落以后，我意识到如果我继续这样活下去我将会彻底毁掉我自己。
